abilities.text: Once during your turn, if you have a Stadium in play, you may heal 50 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Heat Burst
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Ice Rider Calyrex VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Ride of the High King
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Lance
attacks.text: You may discard up to 2 Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 120 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Shadow Rider Calyrex VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Underworld Door
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Psychic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Benched Psychic Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Max Geist
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Psychic Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

name: Melmetal VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: G-Max Juggernaut
attacks.text: This attack does 60 more damage for each extra Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon (in addition to this attack's cost). You can't add more than 120 damage in this way.

name: Kyurem VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Glaciated World
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Water Energy card, attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Frost
attacks.text: You may discard any amount of Water Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

name: Centiskorch VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: G-Max Centiferno
attacks.text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you did any damage with this attack, you may attach a Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

name: Pikachu VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: G-Max Volt Tackle
attacks.text: You may discard all Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 150 more damage.

name: Regieleki VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Transistor
abilities.text: Your Basic Lightning Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Max Thunder and Lightning
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Orbeetle VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Eerie Beam
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: G-Max Wave
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Eternatus VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Eternal Zone
abilities.text: If all of your Pokémon in play are Darkness type, you can have up to 8 Pokémon on your Bench, and you can't put non-Darkness Pokémon into play. (If this Ability stops working, discard Pokémon from your Bench until you have 5.)

attacks.name: Dread End
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Darkness Pokémon in play.

name: Blaziken VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Max Blaze
attacks.text: Choose up to 2 of your Benched Rapid Strike Pokémon and attach an Energy card from your discard pile to each of them.

name: Corviknight VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Lustrous Body
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: G-Max Hurricane
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use G-Max Hurricane.

name: Duraludon VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
